mapper.select: SELECT *, IF((route_postcript_rownum in (SELECT route_postscript_rownum FROM route_postscript_like WHERE username = #{username}) ),'true','false') as 'route_like' FROM rout_postscript
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO route_postscript_like (route_postscript_like_rownum, username, route_postscript_rownum) VALUES (null, #{username}, #{route_postscript_rownum})
mapper.delete: DELETE route_postscript_like WHERE username = #{username} AND route_postscript_rownum = #{route_postscript_rownum}
